org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql
Class AeAbstractSQLStorage

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeSQLObject
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeAbstractSQLStorage
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeAbstractSQLStorageProvider, AeAbstractSQLUpgrader, AeSQLJournalStorage, AeSQLUpgrader
public abstract class AeAbstractSQLStorage
extends AeSQLObject

Base class for SQL storage objects that extract sql statement from AeSQLConfig object.

Method Detail

getSQLStatement

protected java.lang.String getSQLStatement(java.lang.String aStatementName)
                                    throws AeStorageException
Returns a SQL statement from the SQL configuration object. This convenience method prepends the name of the statement with "ProcessStorage.".

Parameters:
aStatementName - The name of the statement, such as "InsertProcess".
Returns:
The SQL statement found for that name.
Throws:
AeStorageException - If the SQL statement is not found.

                     java.lang.String aQueryName,
